title: Hackers Gain Control of LED Billboard for Minutes to Post Racy Images

title: YouTube Ads Are Funding Beijing’s Overseas Push to Change Hearts and Minds: Report
description: The ASPI report examined 1,741 videos on 18 increasingly popular YouTube accounts of influencers from regions of Xinjiang, Tibet, and Inner Mongolia. (ASPI)
